Sometimes, no information on frequency is available. In these cases, the sign or symptom may be rare or common.",GARD,Erythropoietic protoporphyria
What causes Erythropoietic protoporphyria ?,What is the genetic basis of erythropoietic protoporphyria? Erythropoietic protoporphyria is caused by mutations in the FECH gene.,GARD,Erythropoie
